The Menu of the day is ordered until 15:00 pm

28 lei without dessert / 41 lei with dessert

Thursday

Cream Broccoli Soup – vegan /gluten free / paper bio container / 330 ml (broccoli, zucchini, potato, celery, white onion, olive oil, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Chickpea Balls & Carrot Steam – vegan / gluten free/ paper bio container / 300 g (chickpea, parsley, corn, olive oil, himalayan salt, carrot, celery, potato, natural condiments)

Whole Wheat Bread – vegan / with gluten / 70 g (whole wheat, yeast, olive oil, himalayan salt)

or gluten free option

Onion & Olive Crackers Bread – raw / gluten free / 50 g (white onion, millet, black olive, hemp seed, flaxseed, natural condiments, himalayan salt)

Mango & Vanilla Cake – raw / gluten free /110 g (cashews, mango, nuts, almonds, tahina, vanilla, cocoa butter, unfiltered honey)
